name: The Road Trip Game
description:
Calling Up Justice producers Claudia Alick and Maiamama talk a lot about the ethics of AI. SO THEY MADE A GAME ABOUT IT! Game idea by Maiamama and prompts written (and rewritten ) by Claudia and the text of the game was written by ChatGTP.

We've place a page in the game with  Artist Recommendations that you can support and add to!
